1.content:
Lara Finnegan's physics class was coming to an early end, and the students couldn't be happier for it. Nobody was paying much attention to the lecture anymore, the summer heat was becoming unbearable. This had been the hottest June on record, one of the wettest, too, and to make matters worse, the class was being held in the oldest building on campus. The air conditioner had broken, so the building provided little solace to the students. The rain had just started again.

Normally there would be about seventy students in Professor Finnegan's class, though many were skipping to avoid the heat, so only 24 showed up today. Some wanted to avoid the rain that had come in during the week, which only served to make the heat worse by causing the humidity to skyrocket once the rain finished. On top of that, there was always one student who came in late, often causing a slight interruption to the lecture, much to Finnegan's annoyance.

Although it may have been too hot to pay attention to the lecture, some of the students still could not take their eyes off of Professor Finnegan's body. She was fairly young, in her late 20's, with long light brown hair, and a petite, yet curvy body. She stood at an average 5'9", and could blend into a crowd, if not for her exceptional face, accentuated by her glasses.

"I'm going to call it a day, class", she said, scanning the room, knowing nobody was paying attention anymore, "be sure to read chapters 18 and 20 to cover what we didn't cover today, see you tomorrow", and she gathered her papers and left, forgetting a small briefcase on her desk. She, and 13 of the student left at the time. 4 of the students were sleeping, and were just waking up, 6 of them were taking awhile to leave, staying behind and joking with each other, and 2, Mark and Jenna, boyfriend and girlfriend, who noticed that she had left behind a small suitcase.

Curious, they walked up, and noticed it was unlocked, so they opened it, and saw something that looked like a ray gun from a sci fi movie. They picked it up and looked at each other perplexed, when a drop of water fell from the ceiling onto the gun, and the room was filled with a bright light and a loud crack

---------------------------------------------

When the flash subsided and the ringing in their ears stopped, the 12 students in the class noticed that everything around them was gigantic, and it dawned on them that they shrunk. Jenna noticed that mark was crushed under the size gun, now laying on the floor. They began to panic, when they heard footsteps from the hall, and in stepped...

This was beyond stupid, she scolded herself, leaving behind such an important invention, especially one that could be so dangerous in the wrong hands. As she stepped into the classroom, there was an audible crunch as her foot crashed down on an unfortunate soul, flattening him, though she didn't hear. She marched over to her desk, and for a second panicked, until she saw the size gun on the floor, then she siged in relief.

"Oh, thank god", she said, glad that nobody had taken it while she was gone. Who knows what the consequences could have been if somebody else had gotten their hands on it. She reached down to pick it up.

When the flash subsided and the ringing in their ears stopped, the 12 students in the class noticed that everything around them was gigantic, and it dawned on them that they shrunk. Jenna noticed that mark was crushed under the size gun, now laying on the floor. They began to panic, when they heard footsteps from the hall, and in stepped a lost and confused redhead girl around 10 years old.


To the remaining class of shrinkees each step was booming loud and created tremors.


"Huh I could of sworn my cousin said room 202 A" said the girl as she flattened 2 students unaware of their presence.


She then spotted the gun like device on the floor.

"Huh what's this thing? And why is there a ketchup stain on it" she said picking it up.


As she walked over to get some tissues off the teachers desk she didn't noticed 2 more crunch sounds as more students met their end.

As she wiped the “ketchup” off the red headed 10 year old bumped some buttons.
The device was aimed at herself.
She was bathed in a weird light.


“What the? What’s this weird light? And why do I feel weird yet good”


She didn’t notice it at first but she was growing larger.
It took a couple minutes of the device firing and her growing to notice.

“H-hey everything is getting smaller! Even this thing”
she noted as the desks, chairs and even size device in her hand seemed to be getting smaller.


She dropped the device on the desk but it was still bathing her in its strange light.

“What’s going here? The room is getting smaller too”
She said being forced to sit down.


The girl isn’t sure what to do.
Meanwhile the shrunken class runs from the growing titaness.
The growing girl figures the size device is important still unaware it’s making her grow.
She grabs it still firing on her the trigger stuck and holds the shrinking object to her chest.

Jenna noticed that mark was crushed under the size gun, now laying on the floor. They began to panic, when they heard footsteps from the hall, and in stepped Mark's "little sister"
152.title: Mark's little sister.

1521.content:
Tali sat in the hall outside her twin brother's class waiting for it to end. She was looking through some homework while her music played in her earphones. Suddenly Marks teacher left leaving the door open. "Oh hi Tali" the teacher said as she removed her earphones. "Hi Mrs Finnegan" she replied with a smile. "I dismissed class early, no one was playing attention anyway" she stated rolling her eyes. "Anyway I've got a special project I need to work on see you and your brother later"

Tali putting her earphones in picked up her stuff and dropped it into her bag... Meanwhile completely missing the FLASH and CRACK from her brother's class.

...

Mark still dazed glanced up to see his girlfriend crying. A large weight pinning his lower half down. Glancing around the room most of the class was grouping together and making their way to his location. "Hey..." Mark sighed trying to reassure a very upset Jenna before a thunderous footfall turned the corner...

...

Tali turned the corner into her brother's room stopping confused glancing at the room. Did he ignore me waiting outside? She thought no he wouldn't do that... Unless he was paying more attention to Jenna and missed her. She sighed glancing at the suitcase and toy gun on the floor. Well maybe I should help the Professor out she's so busy all the time, and yet so nice and caring for her students. With that she started forward to pick up the fallen gun.

...

Mark saw is small twin walk in the door. They were fraternal twins Mark being older (slightly). Both of them were quite small since her mother's womb shared the nutrients between them, Tali had Raven hair and blue eyes while Mark had brown eyes and hair. Mark saw his sister look at him and step forward. Did she see me? He asked as she lifted the briefcase back onto the desk. Realizing what she was doing he started to shout. Jenna catching on jumped up with weak knees, teary eyes and a red face, jumping up and waving her arms at the giantess reaching down for the gun.

She looks around as they continue shouting but sees and hears nothing.

"Huh must've imagined it"

There were suddenly students laying on top of each other in heeps of disarray.

1551.title: Someone's daughter ( reserved )

choices: Making Lucy grow to 9 1/2 feet tall.

15512.content:
When the flash subsided and the ringing in their ears stopped, the 12 students in the class noticed that everything around them was gigantic, and it dawned on them that they shrunk. Jenna noticed that mark was crushed under the size gun, now laying on the floor. They began to panic, when they heard footsteps from the hall, and in stepped a "little" girl around 3 or 4 years old.



To the shrunken survivors she was anything but.

"I wonder if this is the room mommy is in? Daddy didn't say much"


Each step was like a mini quake to the shrinkees below.

One students eyes went wide.


"OH MY GOD YOU GUYS THATS MY DAUGHTER LUCY"

The other students were shocked at this.

"LUCY SWEETIE CAREFUL WHERE YOU STEP!! ITS MOMMY IM DOWN HERE" yelled the student.


Lucy narrowly missed a few students.

"It's no use my little girl can't see or hear us" said the young mom

"I wouldn't exactly call her little" said another student before **crunch** he met his end.



Lucy walked towards the gun.

"Aww mommy's not in this room either. I wanted to tell mommy the doctor says I grew 2 whole inches"

This irony wasn't lost on the panicked and shrunken class.



"Hey what's this? A toy? Cool! Bestest day ever I'm 2 inches taller , I got a new toy and daddy promised me ice cream"


"JACK DID WHAT? HE KNOWS YOU ARENT SUPPOSED HAVE SWEETS BEFORE DINNER"


The rest of the class had mixed reactions to this motherly outburst.


Lucy began to examine the "toy" she had just found. Unfortunately it was still malfunctioning from earlier and suddenly it discharged again...
15512.title: A students daughter ( reserved. )

choices: I’m Big now! This is cool!
155123.content:
Lucy began to examine the "toy" she had just found. Unfortunately it was still malfunctioning from earlier and suddenly it discharged again!


Lucy’s Mom went nearly catatonic seeing her daughter blasted with a bright light.
She didn’t even immediately notice that the light was a different color than what had shrunk the claw.


At first nothing appeared to happen to the 4 year old.
“Huh that was weird”

Lucy took a few thunderous steps forward inadvertently crushing yet another shrunken student into paste.
Suddenly Lucy felt strange.
“Ooo I feel weird”


Suddenly Lucy was beginning to grow.
Her clothes grew with her too except her shocks and shoes.
Within minutes her height doubled and she burst out of her socks and shoes.

The class retreats.


A few minutes later she stopped growing at 9 feet tall but lost her balance.
Landing with a thud or boom to the shrinkees Lucy flattened a chair.

“Toy” gun still in hand she accidentally activated it again.

This time the light filled the whole room.

The good news is the class was returned to normal sized.
The bad news well....

“Huh I feel weird again! What’s happening”

This time Lucy was growing faster.
The class and her mother fled.



This time the class could only hear much noise, banging and screamingly
It wasn’t until Lucy’s growing body busted thru the building that she was visible.

Legs busted holes in walls.
Her head pushed the roof off.
Her arms flailed as the stuck out of Windows.


It didn’t take the giant 4 year old long to outgrow the building tho.
Finally her growth stopped at 180 feet tall.

How does Lucy react?
155123.title: Making Lucy grow to 180 Feet tall! Lucy living ...

1551232.content:
She wiggles her huge toes, giggling. "I'm so BIG!" She says, smirking.

"Bet those other kids won't call ME short again!" She says, putting her foot up against a door. "My foot is BIGGER than a door!"

She slowly stood up, demolishing the remains of the building. "Oh yes.." She says, the school bus in view.

"Ooh! I feel tingly again!" She says, shooting up to 250 ft. "Yeah! Bigger!" She says with a giggle.

She hovers her foot over the school bus and slowly lowers her foot. "It's so small.." She says, crunching it loudly.

It was nothing but scrap. There was a deep crater in the asphalt.

"Woah!" She says with a giggle.
1551232.title: I’m Big now! This is cool!

choices: The excitement caused her to grow more
15512322.content:
Of course, lucy wasn't nearly done with growing yet as her body continued to increase in mass and Lucy was smiling in delight by this face. If she still had the ray gun she would've definitely fired it again at herself, but her fingers were now just too enormous to pull the trigger. But she didn't mind that, as her growth hasn't even finished.

"Yay! i'm still getting bigger and bigger! My little toes are now bigger than the cars! They even leave HUGE footsteps behind so the cute bugs know that i was here!" Said Lucy joyfully to herself

Lucy then was struck with the sudden desire to crush something under her foot, she didn't know why this was the case but it was difficult for her desires to take over her.

"Hmmm, Ms. Bigfoot says that Mr. Schoolbus felt pretty good underneath him but that he still wants more. Is there anything you want to crush ms. Bigfoot?" Said Lucy calling her enormous right foot as Ms. Bigfoot. After quickly looking around for anything to demolish, she came across a long row houses, with the one at front looking particularly appealing.

"Do you want this one Ms. Bigfoot? Then we should ask the bugs inside first"

Lucy then tapped with her index finger as softly as could against the house to get the house owner's attention, without noticing it, she caused the whole household to shake heavily.

"Hello? Sorry to ask but Ms. Bigfoot said that she wants to crush your house, is she allowed?"

Not too long after, the owners ran out of the house at the sight of Lucy and ran away as far as possible, without even answering her question.

"I think they said yes Ms. Bigfoot. So that means you're-"

As if Ms. Bigfoot had a mind of her own, Lucy automatically rose her right foot high into the air and stomped with a lot of speed on the household, completely demolishing everything in it. A moan of pleasure escaped Lucy's mouth as she cringed by the amazing feeling her foot was going through.

"Ohhhh yes.... Ms. Bigfoot likes Mr. House more than Mr. Schoolbus, but she still wants more. Then we should also ask the other bugs if we could-"

Like the owners of the house Lucy destroyed, the whole neighborhood ran out of their houses to escape the gigantic 4 year old girl.

"Oh. I guess not. But that's okay Ms. Bigfoot, we now have two rows of Mr. house to crush! Doesn't that sound...." Said Lucy while stopping midway through her sentence

Lucy was put into a trance by the realization of her own remark. She now had two rows of houses to crush, if one of them felt amazing, she couldn't imagine how amazing two rows of them would feel, she began to drool at the very thought of it. Still in her trance, Lucy rested her right foot on the roof of the second house and slowly applied more force onto it, she could feel the house cracking and the roof slowly losing the battle underneath her foot, and she enjoyed every second of it until the inevitable happened.

".......wonderful..."

Within a second the house crashed into the
Household and Lucy let out a incredible load moan of pure pleasure out.

"OHHHHN YES!! THAT FEELS SO GOOD! I didn't know why Ms. Bigfoot wanted to crush more, but now i know! I also want to crush! I WANT CRUSH MORE!"

info.brief_description: A scientist creates a ray gun that alters size. GTS, BE, vore, anything welcome.
info.description:
Hey, all, thanks for stopping by. I decided to make a macrophile interactive, inspired by some of the great ones already here, and hope you all like it and contribute.

As of now, I see this as more of an anything goes kind of interactive, mostly giantess/shrink oriented though, though i also like expansion, violence is alright as well. Just no giant males please; shrunken females and normal males are accepted, though. Otherwise, all additions are welcome, and please feel free to contribute.
